function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fragility of global supply network exposed by COVID-19 outbreaks","Impact":"Shutdown of essential facilities and closure of international borders","Mitigation":"Increase agility, ecosystem alignment, and adaptability in supply chains","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, real-time tracking technologies","People":"Manufacturers, retailers, logistics personnel","Owner":"Supply chain managers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of supply chain resilience and reach in operations","Impact":"Inability to respond quickly to demand changes, exposure to disruptions","Mitigation":"Reconfigure supply chains to be more proactive and responsive","Technologies":"Supply chain analytics, demand forecasting tools","People":"Organizations across industries","Owner":"Supply chain managers, industry leaders"}]}
